{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3553261,"name":"Myer","username":"myer","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/myer/{size}/217120_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-10T21:16:59.019Z","cooked":"

Our VH-109 radios are not saving their configurations. We also can’t access them at radio.local anymore like we used to be able to. Every time we unpower the radio and repower it, the configuration is wiped, including team number, WIFI band, etc. We have tried reflashing firmware but it did not fix the problem. If anyone know what’s going on, please help!

Which firmware do you have installed on your VH-109?

Firmware version VH-109_1.3.0-02142025

The VH-109 with that firmware should not be resetting the config when power cycled.
I would ensure it’s not being accidently reconfigured by someone and then contact support afterwards.
https://frc-radio.vivid-hosting.net/overview/support

","post_number":4,"post_type":1,"posts_count":7,"updated_at":"2025-03-10T21:24:22.947Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":3,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":64,"readers_count":63,"score":12.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":495048,"topic_slug":"vh-109-radios-not-saving-configuration","display_username":"Fletcher","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://frc-radio.vivid-hosting.net/overview/support","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"Support | FIRST FRC Radio","clicks":0}],"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":64553,"username":"myer","name":"Myer","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/myer/{size}/217120_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":25039,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"FIRST California | FTAA, CSA, A/V, and everything between."},"post_url":"/t/vh-109-radios-not-saving-configuration/495048/4","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3553315,"name":"Myer","username":"myer","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/myer/{size}/217120_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-10T22:00:35.839Z","cooked":"

Turns out the settings appear to be erased when you open the configurational panel right after the radio boots and you have to wait a minute or more after first accessing the dashboard before the settings are loaded.

Ah. Yeah the settings are not valid until the radio is in the Active state. Something should be added to the webpage to state this.

Ah. Yes. The settings are definitely there, just, not displayed right as it’s booting.

We’ll have this fixed in a later release as it’s minor. Currently things are looking very stable for 1.3.0 and would rather not force a firmware update on teams if we didn’t have to.
